name: mage-module-shard
description: Static data module, including a Google Spreadsheet add-on to manage exports and imports

scripts.test:lint: echo 'Check TypeScript code for style issues' &&   tslint -e "node_modules/**/*.ts" --type-check --format codeFrame --project .
scripts.test:cpd: echo 'Check the codebase for copy-pasted code' &&  jscpd --config .cpd.yaml
scripts.test:unit: echo 'Run unit tests' &&                           mocha --exit --compilers ts:ts-node/register -R mocha-reporter ./test/index.ts
scripts.test:coverage: echo 'Run unit tests and check coverage level' &&  nyc --check-coverage --reporter=text --reporter=html npm run test:unit
scripts.test:git: echo 'Make sure all commits are signed' &&         git-signed

author: Marc Trudel <mtrudel@wizcorp.jp>
